KLdroid

KingLucius personal app store.

Currently it serves 2 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KingLucius/KLdroid/main/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
7E B3 D0 99 B0 79 3F FC FC 5F 4A 59 7C 54 C2 1A 45 F9 F6 E4 DC 97 CA A6 72 ED 06 CB 2C 2E 6C 10
